version_description:
MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available

- Design improvements
- Supports 3D touch for iPhone 6S/6S Plus (3D touch on MusicCast icon)
- Volume operation has been improved

MusicCast Controller has been updated. Overall stability and latency between devices has been improved and new functions are now available.

- You can now stream 3 different music files from your smart device at once! (Processing performance and/or
MusicCast Controller has been updated. Overall stability and latency between devices has been improved and new functions are now available.

MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available
- New option for volume control
- UI design improvements
- Bug fixes

MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available
- Added "All mute on" function under Rooms
- Added "Volume and Power" screen under Rooms
- Added "Add App Shortcut" feature to Room Set

MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available
- Improved design of Source Screen
- Moved Search function to browser screen of each source (Net radio, Phone/Tablet)
- Added Playlist

MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available
- Added TIPS how to use MusicCast
- Support iOS10 (upgraded response of browsing and widget design)

We added new products in Music

MusicCast CONTROLLER has been updated, overall stability has been improved and new functions are now available

- Room Presets
Press and hold a Room to save current settings, including Link, Source and Volume, as a Room Preset.

Functionality improvement

- Added option to choose List or Grid view when browsing server
- Improved functionality

MusicCast Controller has been updated. Overall stability and latency between devices has been improved and new functions are now available.
- Playback seek function for music stored on your smartphone or tablet.
- Share personalized room photos, roo
- Bug fixes
Functionality improvement
Functionality improvement
iPhone X support
Functionality improvement

- Compatible with new 2018 MusicCast models

- Compatible with new 2018 MusicCast models
- Support for MusicCast Surround/Stereo

- Support for MusicCast Surround/Stereo
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes (iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPad (4G))
- Bug fixes
Functionality improvement
Bug fixes

- Register Room Presets to Siri shortcuts (by long-press of Room Presets) and recall them via Siri
- Now works with Google Assistant using the MusicCast Action (English)
- Performance improvements

- Support to change the surround decoder type setting (for AV Receiver)
- Other improvements
Functionality improvement

- UI improvements
- Supports Dark Mode in iOS 13
- Improved functionality

Bug fixes
Hiding streaming services icons that are not officially available in Russia when Russian is selected as an iOS language.
Spotify, Tidal, Napster, Amazon Music, Alexa will be hidden from inputs

- Bug fixes
Hiding streaming services icons that are not officially available in Russia when Russian is selected as an iOS language.
Spotify, Tidal, Napster, Amazon Music, Alexa, Qobuz will be hidden from inputs
